Installation

Getting and installing stado should not take much time.

Requirements

Stado require only:

  • Python, supported versions: 3.2, 3.3

You can use stado on Unix or Windows systems.

Getting stado

The best way to get stado is downloading the latest release version. Then you place stado.py file in empty directory. That's all!
